parameters.description: Revision of the plan for which you want data. If the current plan is a different revision you will get an ViewRevisionMismatchException exception. If you do not supply a revision you will get data for the latest revision.

get.description: Returns the list of parent field filter model for the given list of workitem ids

post.description: Add a new plan for the team

get.description: Get the information for the specified plan

put.description: Update the information for the specified plan

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: Revision of the plan for which you want data. If the current plan is a different revision you will get an ViewRevisionMismatchException exception. If you do not supply a revision you will get data for the latest revision.

workItemTypeMappedStates.description: Mapped states for work item types

typeFields.description: Field Type (e.g. Order, Activity) to Field Reference Name map

categoryReferenceName.description: Reference name of the corresponding WIT category

pluralName.description: Plural name for the backlog level

workItemTypes.description: Collection of valid workitem type names for the given backlog level

addPanelFields.description: List of fields to include in Add Panel

columnFields.description: Default list of columns for the backlog

defaultWorkItemType.description: Defaulst Work Item Type for the backlog

id.description: Backlog Id (for Legacy Backlog Level from process config it can be categoryref name)

workItemCountLimit.description: Max number of work items to show in the given backlog

workItemTypes.description: Work Item types participating in this backlog as known by the project/Process, can be overridden by team settings for bugs

url.description: Full http link to the resource

additionalFields.description: A collection of field reference names of additional fields on cards. The index in the collection signifies the order of the field among the additional fields. Currently unused. Should be used with User Story 691539: Card setting: additional fields

assignedToDisplayFormat.description: Display format for the assigned to field

showAssignedTo.description: Flag indicating whether to show assigned to field on cards. When true, AssignedToDisplayFormat will determine how the field will be displayed

showEmptyFields.description: Flag indicating whether to show empty fields on cards

showId.description: Flag indicating whether to show ID on cards

showState.description: Flag indicating whether to show state field on cards

showTags.description: Flag indicating whether to show tags on cards

fields.description: A collection of settings related to rendering of fields on cards

workItemTypes.description: Work item types for the backlog category

name.description: Name of the plan to create.

childIdToParentIdMap.description: Work item child id to parenet id map

endDate.description: The end date of the delivery view data

startDate.description: The start date for the delivery view data

url.description: Full http link to more information about the field

cardSettings.description: Card settings such as fields and rules

createdBy.description: Identity when the plan was created. Default to Empty Guid for the existing records before upgrading to ScaledAgileViewComponent4, which means we do not know the identity that created this resource.

createdDate.description: Date when the plan was created

modifiedBy.description: Identity when the plan was last modified.  Default to Empty Guid for the existing records before upgrading to ScaledAgileViewComponent4, which means we do not know the identity that last modified this resource.

modifiedDate.description: Date when the plan was last modified. Default to CreatedDate when the plan is first created.

ownerId.description: OwnerId of the plan, typically same as the TFID of the team under which this plan has been created

properties.description: The PlanPropertyCollection instance associated with the plan. These are dependent on the type of the plan. For example, DeliveryTimelineView, it would be of type DeliveryViewProperyCollection.

revision.description: Revision of the plan. Used to safeguard users from overwriting each other's changes.

url.description: The resource url to locate the plan via rest api

createdBy.description: TFID of the creator of the plan

modifiedDate.description: Last modified date of the plan

typeFields.description: Type fields for the process configuration

url.description: Full http link to the resource

field.description: Shallow ref to the field being used as a team field

values.description: Collection of all valid team field values

activities.description: Collection of capacities associated with the team member

daysOff.description: The days off associated with the team member

teamMember.description: Shallow Ref to the associated team member

backlogVisibilities.description: Information about categories that are visible on the backlog.

defaultIteration.description: Default Iteration, the iteration used when creating a new work item on the queries page.

workingDays.description: Days that the team is working

_links.description: Collection of links relevant to resource

url.description: Full http link to the resource

attributes.description: Attributes such as start and end date

backlog.description: Backlog matching the mapped backlog associated with this team.

fieldReferenceNames.description: The field reference names of the work item data

isExpanded.description: Was iteration and work item data retrieved for this team.  Teams with IsExpanded false have not had their iteration, work item, and field related data queried and will never contain this data. If true then these items are queried and, if there are items in the queried range, there will be data.

iterations.description: The iteration data, including the work items, in the queried date range.

orderByField.description: The order by field name of this team

partiallyPagedFieldReferenceNames.description: The field reference names of the partially paged work items, such as ID, WorkItemType

projectId.description: The project id the team belongs team

teamFieldName.description: The team field name of this team

workItemTypeColors.description: Colors for the work item types.

finishDate.description: The end date of the iteration

partiallyPagedWorkItems.description: All the partially paged workitems in this iteration.

startDate.description: The start date of the iteration

workItems.description: The work items that have been paged in this iteration

cardSettings.description: Card settings such as fields and rules

name.description: Name of the plan to create.

revision.description: Revision of the plan that was updated - the value used here should match the one the server gave the client in the Plan.

states.description: State name to state category map

api-Version.name: api-version
api-Version.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '3.1-preview' to use this version of the api.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
